      This function sets the number of maximum attempts the RoutingAlgorithm gets to find a path for its Shipment

      This function sets the WeightedMetric used to measure the cost to move along paths

      This function sets the Shipment that is to be routed by this algorithm
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<Segment> validPaths(java.util.ArrayList<Segment> path)
      This is the getPath function, it will return a path from the start location to the end location or a null path if it fails.
